p: The 1:4,000,000 scale grassland type map is obtained from the Natural Resources Comprehensive Investigation Committee of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. The total of 11 grassland types in Xinjiang are grouped into 3 classes according to their properties: Desert grassland (Temperate desert, Temperate steppe-desert and Alpine desert), Steppe grassland (Temperate meadow steppe, Temperate steppe, Temperate desert steppe, Alpine steppe and Alpine desert Steppe) and Meadow grassland (Mountain meadow, Alpine meadow and Lowland meadow) (Fig.Â 5).
